title: Jayce skin
body:
It will be 2 years this valentines day since jayce has had a new skin. I mean come on riot.

Why do they just refuse to give old champions new skins? I mean braum/vel'koz are pretty new and already getting new skins.

What the hell.

replies.body: But he makes it look so good

It will be 3 years in March since Urgot got a new skin.
4 years in April since Zilean got a new skin
4 years in July since Sion got a new skin.
3 years since an Akali or Kennen skin.

a lot of champions (123 in fact) to make skins for.
Skins will come when there is a cool idea for them or they fit a certain style. Not just because Riot want money (anymore).

New champions get skins because they don't have any and people have cool ideas for the newer champions.
Most champions now get a "launch skin" then another one soon after and then are left alone unless a cool idea comes up.

Good to see though that Jinx is finally getting another skin, Warwick getting another for a while too

Sion basically got all new skins with his rework.

Akali, zilean, kennen and urgot all need new visual updates not new skins

Zac, however, does need a new skin too.
It also depends how easy the Champion is to make a skin for
Zac's only alternate skin is from when he was released

They had a blue/pink skin for him but they didn't just want to give him another recolour.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/red-post-collection-riotscruffy-q-on.html#2
Jayce is harder to make skins for, more work.
